title: 3 Bed, 2.5 Bath JP Townhouse
posting_body: Nothing compares to the quality, amenities, size, and location of this three-story townhouse w/ almost 1700 sqft., 3 bedrooms and 2.5 baths, 9’ ceilings w/ crown molding throughout.
Level 1 has a bedroom, with a full bath, stone/ceramic tile throughout, and a direct entrance to the heated 2-car garage.
Level 2 has a living room w/ gas fireplace, EIK kitchen w/ SS appliances, Kemper cabinets, island, plus ½ bath and 6’x19 ’private deck w/ gas connection for a grill.
Level 3 has a primary bedroom, w/ two closets, en-suite full bath w/ double sink.
Also, the third bedroom with 6’x19’ private deck and a third-floor washer/dryer.
Forced gas hot air w/ 3 zones, central AC, and vacuum.
Great location, close to Green St T stop, Minton Stables, Franklin Park, and Centre St retail shops and restaurants.
